title: Which is best, chemical engineering or chemical technology? - Quora

response.answer_text: Totally depends on your choice, Chemical technology covers specific fields and you can specialize in one of the minute fields like nanotechnology, material science, food technology, ppastic technology etc. and chemical engineering will offer you a broader spectrum of options and moreover options are immense in chemical engineering for higher education and has much more recognition which is although wrong but that's the way it is :)

Of course chemical engineering without any second thought, as it is the core branch while chemical technology, petroleum engineering, petrochemical are derived from chemical engineering only as they are the specialization course that comes under chemical engineering . Gaint govt oil Companies(psu) like ongc, iocl allows chemical engineering for the jobs through gate in their notifications and also some government companies allow chemical engineering as it is the mother of all. All the best take your decision wisely
